mapper.select: SELECT clss_Id, mngr_Id, cmpy_Id, clss_Nm, clss_Content, limit_Cnt, aply_Start_Dt, aply_End_Dt, clss_Start_Dd, clss_End_Dd, set_In_Tm, set_Out_Tm, cmcd_nm as clss_Cd, clss_Adr, clss_Total_Tm, file_Id, clss_Etc FROM clss JOIN cmcd m ON clss.clss_cd = m.cmcd_id WHERE mngr_id = #{mngrId} ORDER BY clss_nm
SELECT COUNT(stdt_id) FROM aply WHERE clss_id = #{clss_id}
SELECT COUNT(stdt_id) FROM rgst WHERE clss_id = #{clss_id}
SELECT * FROM cmcd WHERE cmcd_id like #{keyword} ||'%'

SELECT clss_Id, mngr.mngr_Nm AS mngrId, cmpy_Id, clss_Nm, clss_Content, limit_Cnt, aply_Start_Dt, aply_End_Dt, clss_Start_Dd, clss_End_Dd, set_In_Tm, set_Out_Tm, cmcd_nm as clss_Cd, clss_Adr, clss_Total_Tm, file_Id, clss_Etc FROM clss JOIN cmcd m ON clss.clss_cd = m.cmcd_id JOIN mngr ON mngr.mngr_id=clss.mngr_id WHERE clss_id= #{clssId}
SELECT file_sub_id FROM flup WHERE file_id = #{fileId} AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY file_sub_id
SELECT * FROM flup WHERE file_id=#{fileId} AND file_sub_id=#{fileSubId} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT file_id, file_sub_id, file_nm, file_Size, file_type FROM flup WHERE file_id=#{fileId} AND file_sub_id=#{fileSubId} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT s.stdt_Id, s.user_Email, s.stdt_Nm, c1.cmcd_nm AS gender_Cd, s.birth_Dd, s.stdt_Tel, r.cmpt_cd AS job_Cd FROM stdt s JOIN cmcd c1 ON s.gender_cd = c1.cmcd_id JOIN (SELECT stdt_id, clss_id, cmcd.cmcd_nm AS cmpt_cd FROM rgst JOIN cmcd ON cmcd.cmcd_id = rgst.cmpt_cd) r ON s.stdt_id = r.stdt_id WHERE s.stdt_id in (SELECT stdt_id FROM rgst WHERE clss_id = #{clssId})
SELECT count(wlog_id) FROM wlog WHERE wlog_cd = 'WOK0000002' AND stdt_id=#{stdtId} AND delete_yn='N'
SELECT count(wlog_id) FROM wlog WHERE wlog_cd = 'WOK0000003' AND stdt_id=#{stdtId} AND delete_yn='N'
SELECT count(wlog_id) FROM wlog WHERE wlog_cd = 'WOK0000004' AND stdt_id=#{stdtId} AND delete_yn='N'
SELECT max(clss_id) FROM clss WHERE mngr_id = #{mngrId}
